title: Identical twin nurses help deliver identical twin girls in hospital where they work
text:
Identical twin nurses help deliver identical twin girls in hospital where they work originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

A set of identical twin nurses assisted in the delivery room as identical twin girls entered the world.

Tori Howard and her sister Tara Drinkard, 26, were present when Addison and Emma Williams were born Sept. 25, at Piedmont Athens Regional Medical Center in Athens, Georgia.

Howard is an NICU nurse and Drinkard is a nurse in labor and delivery. Howard told "Good Morning America" that she and her sister learned they'd be working in the same room moments before the births.

"For every c-section that labor and delivery does, we have one NICU nurse that goes because c-sections are higher risk," Howard explained.

PHOTO: Addison Williams was born at 12:42 p.m. on Sept. 25 in Georgia, and Emma arrived 3 minutes later. (Brannan and Rebecca Williams) More

(MORE: Woman who carried twins for twin sister who couldn't get pregnant gives birth: 'Those kids are going to be so loved')

"I was excited to go to a delivery with my sister but it didn't really cross my mind -- we're twins and they're twins," she added.

Brannan and Rebecca Williams, parents to newborns Addison and Emma, said they were excited to learn that two of the nurses were twins just like their daughters.

PHOTO: Tori Howard and her sister Tara Drinkard, 26, were bornJanuary 15, 1993. Here, they are held by their mother, Jeannie Hardy. (Tori Howard) More

PHOTO: Brannan and Rebecca Williams, parents to newborns Addison and Emma, said they were excited to learn that two of the nurses were twins just like their daughters. (Piedmont Athens Regional Medical Center) More

"It was pretty neat because Tara took care of Becca in the labor and delivery room and Tori was taking care of Emma in the NICU," Brannan WIlliams told "GMA."

(MORE: 'It wasn't planned': Twin brothers welcome baby boys hours apart)

Addison was born at 12:42 p.m. and Emma arrived 3 minutes later.

PHOTO: Tori Howard (right) and her sister Tara Drinkard (left), 26, were present when Addison and Emma Williams were born Sept. 25, at Piedmont Athens Regional Medical Center in Athens, Georgia. (Piedmont Athens Regional Medical Center) More

Howard and Drinkard, are 1 minute apart and Howard is the oldest.

Rebecca Williams said she'll be sharing Addison and Emma's birth story as they grow.

PHOTO: Tori Howard and her sister Tara Drinkard, 26, were present when Addison and Emma Williams were born Sept. 25, at Piedmont Athens Regional Medical Center in Athens, Georgia. (Piedmont Athens Regional Medical Center/Tori Howard) More

The babies were born early at 32 weeks and 6 days. They're still in the NICU, and are scheduled to head home Thursday.
description: A set of identical twin nurses assisted in the delivery room as identical twin girls entered the world.  Tori Howard and her sister Tara Drinkard, 26, were present when Addison and Emma Williams were born Sept. 25, at Piedmont Athens Regional Medical Center in Athens, Georgia.  Howard is an NICU nurse
